archimate:Contract.name: Public Write Access
archimate:Contract.documentation: The set of policies defined by the Sovrin Governance Framework governing how an Identity Owner may write a Transaction directly to the Sovrin Ledger without needing to go through an authorized Transaction Endorser. Mutually exclusive with Permissioned Write Access. See Sovrin Ledger Access Policies.
